data.text: Vuika ntinu fuanana kuaku, a Nzambi
Niandi wela sambisa batu baku mu busonga
Miongo miela natina batu mamboti ;
Wela vavila batu mu phasi va khatitsika batu
Bela kanga ntima thangu bu yikidi
Niangi wela ba banga mvula yinnokina mu tsola yisolo,
Mu bilumbu biandi, mutu wusonga wela mona mamboti,
Wela yadilanga tona ku mbu nate ku mbu wunkaka ;
Makanda ma dikanga mela
Mintinu mi Talisi ayi mi bisanga bidi thama
Mintinu mioso miela buongama va ntualꞌandi
Bila wela kula nsukami wulembo yamikina ;
Wela mona mutu wulebakana ayi nsukami kiadi
Wela kula kuba kula mu khuamusu ayi mu makhemi
Bika kazinga !
Bika makundi maba mawombo mu tsi
Bika dizina diandi dizingila mu zithangu zioso ;
Nzitusu wuba kuidi Yave Nzambi
Nzitusu wuba kuidi dizina diandi
Vava vasukila zitsambulu zi Davidi, muana Yese.
